entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a wizard who split his soul into multiple Horcruxes. The text states that no book would have given him the information on how to do this.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore received proof that Voldemort had split his soul and is mentioned as having handed Harry a diary that contained instructions on how to reopen the Chamber of Secrets.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having given Dumbledore the diary that contained the instructions on how to reopen the Chamber of Secrets.

relationships.description: Voldemort split his soul into multiple Horcruxes.
Dumbledore received proof that Voldemort had split his soul.
Dumbledore handed Harry the diary that contained instructions on how to reopen the Chamber of Secrets.
Voldemort created Riddle's diary, which contained instructions on how to reopen the Chamber of Secrets.
